mapper.select: select st.id, st.student_id , st.student_name , st.start_time , st.day, st.created_time , if(hp.END_TIME_ is null, '未审批', '已审批') as status from sys_task st LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst hp on st.pro_inst_id = hp.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_ru_task rt on st.pro_inst_id = rt.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN act_hi_varinst hv on st.pro_inst_id = hv.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE (hv.NAME_ = 'teacherId' and hv.LONG_ = #{teacherId}) or rt.NAME_ = '班主任' order by st.id desc
